job.title: Software Developer
job.description: ltstronggtltugtOverviewltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtIf you are into programming working in small teams and solving complex problems using the latest in Cloud Mobile and Web technologies Pariveda Solutions is the company for you Our Seattle team is growing and looking for software developers who want to design develop and deliver enterpriselevel applications This is an opportunity to expand your knowledge of full life cycle development gain direct client exposure and grow yourself and team membersltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtYou Can Expect Toltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligt Grow your career eligible for promotion every 12 months and a clearly defined career path with the tools support and mentors to get there ltligtltligt Interesting work with interesting people Work on small teams with other Pariveda employees and clients ltligtltligt Challenge your brain Think through complex problems and work with a team to implement realworld solutions ltligtltligt Embark on new adventures Shorterterm engagements mean the client and type of project change often ltligtltligt Try new things Learn to estimate gather requirements develop test manage projects architect and deliver We do it all ltligtltligt Explore different technologies Develop applications in a wide range of languages across web mobile and cloud development and dive into datadriven solutions ltligtltligt Sharpen your communication skills Create and present findings solutions and demos to audiences including senior executives and stakeholders ltligtltligt Become a part of something bigger Actively engage in our culture of continuous learning community service social gatherings and personal and professional development ltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtWe Look Forltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligt Passionate coders with application development experience ltligtltligt The complete package We design code and deliver ltligtltligt Skilled problem solvers with the desire and proven ability to create innovative solutions ltligtltligt Flexible and adaptable attitude Client teams and technologies will change with each new challenge ltligtltligt Future technology leaders Dynamic individuals energized by fast paced personal and professional growth ltligtltligt Phenomenal communicators who can explain and present concepts to technical and nontechnical audiences alike ltligtltligt Bachelors Degree in MIS Computer Science Math Engineering or comparable experience ltligtltligt Legally authorized to work for any company in the United States without sponsorship ltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtPariveda Benefitsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligt Competitive Salary ltligtltligt Exceptional 401k  4 company match ltligtltligt Plenty of Paid Time Off  4 weeks of vacation time plus 10 holidays ltligtltligt Paid sabbatical after 5 years of service for Principal levels and above ltligtltligt Paid parental leave ltligtltligt Company Ownership through Employee Stock Ownership Plan ESOP from your very first day at Pariveda ltligtltligt Excellent Healthcare and Wellness ltligtltligt 100 company paid premiums for you and your family medical dental vision ltligtltligt Life Insurance ltligtltligt Short Term and Long Term Disability ltbrgtltligtltulgtIf you are inspired by our mission and our beliefs and want to join us in developing yourself and others as Consultant in our Seattle office apply todayltbrgtltbrgtThe Business of IT is a registered trademark of Pariveda Solutions Inc describing where IT departments need to act more
